events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is damaged and not working as expected. There is a noticeable scratch on the surface, and it feels faulty.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect due to the damage and scratches mentioned by the customer.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specializing in product defects for further assistance.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear your product arrived damaged. I'll do my best to help get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the damage and the product's serial number so that we can proceed with the replacement process?
I have attached photos showing the scratches and the product label where the serial number is clearly visible for your review.
Thank you for the photos. We will send a replacement unit at no extra cost and arrange a pickup for the damaged item within the next three business days.
That sounds great, thank you for resolving this so quickly. I appreciate the prompt response and will wait for the replacement.
The replacement order has been processed and the pickup for the damaged product scheduled. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement product has arrived and is in good condition. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and is in perfect condition. Thank you for your help throughout this process.
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing the case now, and feel free to contact us anytime in the future for assistance.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback is important to help us improve our service.
